plot: Nothing happens, nothing ever happens in this tenement flat in Glasgow. Just friends watching mindless TV, drinking way too much beer while Dan is injecting again.
title: Waiting for Better Times
plot_es: Nothing happens, nothing ever happens in this tenement flat in Glasgow. Just friends watching mindless TV, drinking way too much beer while Dan is injecting again.
